description: http://anidb.net/ch78198 [Izuku]`s first Hero Costume is a green full-body unitard with a red belt, elbow pads, knee pads, gloves, and red boots. He also wears a mask with long ear-like protrusions that resembles http://anidb.net/ch78199 [All Might]`s haircut, and a mask with a smile on it.
name: Deku
